hero.title: CroCoder - An Experienced Software Development Team For Projects with big impact.
hero.text: Whether you are redesigning your app, improving your website performance, or need help structuring your codebase, we can help you reach your goals.
hero.imageAlt: CroCoder crocodile in a hoodie holding a laptop

ourClients.title: Our Clients
ourClients.text: At CroCoder, we’ve worked with various organizations, including enterprises, startups, and small businesses. We’ve built MVPs, helped projects scale up, refactored legacy code and, set up the architecture for transitioning into the React/Node world. Is there something we can do for you?

lastCard.text: Want to join our success stories?

cards.title: Skew Analytics
cards.text: We worked on building the whole MVP and were responsible for complete back-end development, DevOps and infrastructure setup, and the front-end development. We implemented the whole authentication system, custom dashboard, and set up the basic component library.

cards.title: Searchmetrics
cards.text: At Searchmetrics, we participated in defining standards and rules to ease development and reduce time to develop different features. We were responsible for the front-end development of new features and, worked on improving the developer environment and the front-end CI/CD processes of the shared codebase.

cards.title: Lynes
cards.text: For Lynes, we helped start a new Croatian office, which meant finding the right technical talent and initial mentoring to make sure they had the right technical and soft skills. Additionally, we were responsible for designing and implementing telephone calls on a platform designed for real-time communication.

cards.title: TransferHero
cards.text: Participating as part of a remote team we implemented the solution's back end and front end. Additionally, we helped with the initial project DevOps setup and were responsible for complete user account management, implementing the booking system for transfer reservations, and payment system integration via Stripe.

cards.title: MisterSpex
cards.text: At German-based enterprise Mister Spex, we worked as front-end developers to create a structured shared custom component codebase that can be reused by multiple teams working with different domains. Additionally, we advised how the performance and structure of the implemented solution can be improved.

content.title: We Work Remotely
content.text: We are a remote-first team with extensive experience in working with the distributed and diverse organizations. To efficiently collaborate, we make sure to have at least 6-working-hours overlap with your team members.
content.imageAlt: CroCoder crocodile participating in an online video-call

content.title: We Work as Members of Your Team
content.text: We operate as equal members - using the same tools, participating in the same meetings and, using the same workflows and processes your business has set up. We are highly adaptable and do not have a problem collaborating with different departments.
content.imageAlt: CroCoder crocodile talking to a person from his team

content.title: We Work With React and Node
content.text: We specialize in crafting high-quality software using the tools and frameworks in the React.js and Node.js ecosystem. We always recommend approaches that might be favorable for the long run, but are highly adaptable and can work with what you prefer.
content.imageAlt: A group of logo images of technologies the CroCoder team works with
